name: 春风 | Spring Breeze
description: Romantic college campus love, would you pick older sister or younger sister as your partner? Carefully choose one in the game and try your best to catch your favorite goddess.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core 2 Due E6300 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 7300GT  or  ATI X1600 pro Storage: 500 MB available space
